metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1352 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Git for Visual Studioimproperly sanitizes input, aka 'Git for Visual Studio Remote CodeExecution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1349,CVE-2019-1350, CVE-2019-1354, CVE-2019-1387.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1352` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

git - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-all - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-cvs - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-daemon-run - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-daemon-sysvinit - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-el - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-email - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-gui - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-man - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-mediawiki - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
git-svn - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
gitk - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
gitweb - 1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: git package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.17.1-1ubuntu0.5').
